mapper.select: SELECT events.*, coupons.coupon_title FROM events JOIN coupons ON events.coupon_id = coupons.id ORDER BY events.id DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE events SET event_title = #{eventTitle}, event_content = #{eventContent}, event_img = #{eventImg}, event_start_date = #{eventStartDate}, event_end_date = #{eventEndDate}, coupon_id = #{couponId} WHERE id = #{id}
